teaser: Airing on Monday, May 11, 2015: First up, we'll talk with Julie Ask, Vice President at Forrester Research, about Nokia’s mapping service Here. Then, we'll talk to Laurie Davis, an online dating consultant, about an exclusive dating app called The League that launched in New York this week. Plus, Kyle Wiens, CEO of iFixit, joins us to talk about teardowns and repairing devices before you replace them.

Then, we'll talk to Laurie Davis, an online dating consultant, about an exclusive dating app called The League that launched in New York this week. Plus, Kyle Wiens, CEO of iFixit, joins us to talk about teardowns and repairing devices before you replace them.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, May 11, 2015
